<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Functions in this group operate on composite constants.

### LLVMGetAggregateElement() {#ga90e4e89e41aab3920182a21660eac04f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LLVMValueRef LLVMGetAggregateElement (<a href="/docs/api/groups/llvmcsupporttypes/#ga113ce952344691b8304a43a314f8be17">LLVMValueRef</a> C, unsigned Idx)</>}>
Get element of a constant aggregate (struct, array or vector) at the specified index.

Returns null if the index is out of range, or it&#39;s not possible to determine the element (e.g., because the constant is a constant expression.)


<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant/#acd530d0571f320d47d37e7ae51cf70ff">llvm::Constant::getAggregateElement()</a>
</SectionUser>

</MemberDefinition>
